code: @Manual{,   title = {strava: Strava API},   author = {Tyler Littlefield},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/tyluRp/strava, https://tylurp.github.io/strava/}, }

title: Strava API
text: goal strava access strava API R.

title: Strava API
text: First, create API application personal strava account, read : https://developers.strava.com/docs/getting-started/ store following credentials .Renviron file can find usethis::edit_r_environ: STRAVA_ID STRAVA_SECRET Refresh R session make request: first time make request, asked authorize. authorization, token cached memory future requests current session.

title: Get Activity — get_activities
text: Returns given activity owned authenticated athlete. Requires activity:read Everyone Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all activities.

title: Get Activity — get_activities
code: get_activities(   id,   include_all_efforts = NULL,   scope = "activity:read",   client = strava_client() )

title: Get Activity — get_activities
text: id identifier activity. include_all_efforts include segments efforts. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: List Activity Comments — get_activities_comments
text: Returns comments given activity. Requires activity:read Everyone Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all activities.

title: List Activity Comments — get_activities_comments
code: get_activities_comments(   id,   page = 1,   per_page = 30,   scope = "activity:read",   client = strava_client() )

title: List Activity Comments — get_activities_comments
text: id identifier activity. page Page number. Defaults 1. per_page Number items per page. Defaults 30. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: List Activity Kudoers — get_activities_kudos
text: Returns athletes kudoed activity identified identifier. Requires activity:read Everyone Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all activities.

title: List Activity Kudoers — get_activities_kudos
code: get_activities_kudos(   id,   page = 1,   per_page = 30,   scope = "activity:read",   client = strava_client() )

title: List Activity Kudoers — get_activities_kudos
text: id identifier activity. page Page number. Defaults 1. per_page Number items per page. Defaults 30. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: List Activity Laps — get_activities_laps
text: Returns laps activity identified identifier. Requires activity:read Everyone Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all activities.

title: List Activity Laps — get_activities_laps
text: id identifier activity. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: Get Activity Zones — get_activities_zones
text: Summit Feature. Returns zones given activity. Requires activity:read Everyone Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all activities.

title: Get Activity Zones — get_activities_zones
text: id identifier activity. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: Get Authenticated Athlete — get_athlete
text: Returns currently authenticated athlete. Tokens profile:read_all scope receive detailed athlete representation; others receive summary representation.

title: Get Authenticated Athlete — get_athlete
text: scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: List Athlete Activities — get_athlete_activities
text: Returns activities athlete specific identifier. Requires activity:read. activities filtered unless requested token activity:read_all.

title: List Athlete Activities — get_athlete_activities
code: get_athlete_activities(   before = NULL,   after = NULL,   page = 1,   per_page = 30,   scope = "activity:read",   client = strava_client() )

title: List Athlete Activities — get_athlete_activities
text: epoch timestamp use filtering activities taken place certain time. epoch timestamp use filtering activities taken place certain time. page Page number. Defaults 1. per_page Number items per page. Defaults 30. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: Get Athlete Stats — get_athlete_stats
text: Returns activity stats athlete. includes data activities set Everyone visibilty.

title: Get Athlete Stats — get_athlete_stats
text: id identifier athlete. Must match authenticated athlete. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: Get Zones — get_athlete_zones
text: Returns authenticated athlete's heart rate power zones. Requires profile:read_all.

title: Get Zones — get_athlete_zones
text: scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: Get Club — get_clubs
text: Returns given club using identifier.

title: Get Club — get_clubs
text: id identifier club. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: List Club Activities — get_clubs_activities
text: Retrieve recent activities members specific club. authenticated athlete must belong requested club order hit endpoint. Pagination supported. Athlete profile visibility respected activities.

title: List Club Activities — get_clubs_activities
code: get_clubs_activities(   id,   page = 1,   per_page = 30,   scope = "activity:read",   client = strava_client() )

title: List Club Activities — get_clubs_activities
text: id identifier club. page Page number. Defaults 1. per_page Number items per page. Defaults 30. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: List Club Administrators — get_clubs_admins
text: Returns list administrators given club.

title: List Club Administrators — get_clubs_admins
code: get_clubs_admins(   id,   page = 1,   per_page = 30,   scope = "activity:read",   client = strava_client() )

title: List Club Administrators — get_clubs_admins
text: id identifier club. page Page number. Defaults 1. per_page Number items per page. Defaults 30. scope Authorization scope. client Strava client. default, assumes client credentials stored .Renviron file.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: See magrittr::%>% details.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: result calling rhs(lhs).

title: strava: Strava API — strava-package
text: Easily access data 'Strava API' https://developers.strava.com/.

title: strava: Strava API — strava-package
text: Maintainer: Tyler Littlefield tylerlittlefield@hey.com

title: Create a strava client — strava_client
text: Create strava client

title: Create a strava client — strava_client
code: strava_client(   id = Sys.getenv("STRAVA_ID"),   secret = Sys.getenv("STRAVA_SECRET"),   token_url = "https://www.strava.com/oauth/token",   name = "strava-oauth" )

title: Create a strava client — strava_client
text: id Client ID. default, attempts pull ID .Renviron file. secret Client secret default, attempts pull ID .Renviron file. token_url Token URL. need changed. name Client name. default, 'strava-oauth' can name whatever.
